text:
Eduardo Gómez Manzano (27 July 1951 – 28 July 2019) was a Spanish actor and comedian. He was born in Madrid, Spain. He was know for his roles in "Aquí no hay quien viva", "La que se avecina" and "Butterfly's Tongue".
Gómez died from laryngeal cancer in Madrid on 28 July 2019 at the age of 68.
